duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist patients with registration, answering questions, and addressing concerns during the hospital check-in process.
Collect and input patient and insurance information accurately and efficiently.
Listen to patients with compassion, provide reassurance, and handle unexpected situations during the registration process.
Work in a fast-paced and busy environment, involving interaction with clinicians and patients.
Stay up to date on vaccinations, pass a drug test, and clear a background check prior to hire.
